text: Would love the ability to display multiple columns in a foreign ID field in HubDB, right now we can only choose one, but I would like to show two or more to make it clear to the user what they're selecting (in my case many "Names" are the same, and so are many "Filters", but the combination of Filter+Name is unique
Basically just make the "Select column" a multiselect
Also, being able to define whether the user should be able to select one or multiple rows from the foreign table would be nice

Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
